metadata.title: CVE-2023-4232 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ofono, an Open Source Telephony on Linux. A stackoverflow bug is triggered within the decode_status_report() function duringthe SMS decoding. It is assumed that the attack scenario is accessible froma compromised modem, a malicious base station, or just SMS. There is abound check for this memcpy length in decode_submit(), but it was forgottenin decode_status_report().

criterions.comment: ofono package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
